root.name: Eternal City
root.description: OverviewEternal City is an action/platformer developed and published by Naxat Soft for the PC Engine platform.GameplayIn Eternal City the player assumes control of a girl named Minty Geile which is controlling a mech from the inside. The game is a platformer in which players can jump and shoot trying to make it to the bottom of each stage. Once the bottom of a stage is reached a boss will be fought.Located in each stage is a point in which the player will be given a password which will allow them to continue from that point.
